name: HSP_BFH_ACT_CREATED_BDCS
description: The record IDs for the BDC records created from the Log BDC action performed as part of a billing activity.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the activity history record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: ACT_CREATED_BDC_ID
columns.description: Stores the numeric IDs for the BDC records created by a Log BDC billing activity action. For the Log Denial action, this will include the IDs of the denials created as well as the IDs for the associated remarks created with the denials.
